name: DC Universe Online: Episode 20 - Blackest Night & Wastelands Wonderland
summary: The twentieth episode, Blackest Night and Wastelands Wonderland, was released on January 6, 2016 for members with a subscription, and January 13, 2016 for players without an active subscription. The episode revolved around players fighting The Blackest Night and dealing with the fallout from the War of the Light saga. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Blackest Night and one Tier 7 Duo in Wastelands Wonderland.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: Blackest Night Revealed in Episode 20! Preview the stunning conclusion to the War of the Light!
